entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kuujjuarapik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -33.8°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
